mapper.select: select User from classusers where Class=#{classId}
select UserKey from departmentusers where DepartmentKey=#{departmentKey}
SELECT knowledgeContentId FROM knowledges WHERE SubjectTree_Id = #{subjectTree_Id} AND content = '仿真考核';
SELECT id FROM subjecttrees WHERE SubjectKey = #{subjectKey} AND TreeName = '来闯关'

SELECT QuesScore FROM develop_resource.stuqueinfors WHERE PagerKey = ( SELECT knowledgeContentId FROM develop_resource.knowledges WHERE SubjectTree_Id = ( SELECT id FROM develop_resource.subjecttrees WHERE SubjectKey = #{pagerKey} AND TreeName = '来闯关' ) AND content = '仿真考核' ) AND StuKey =#{stuKey};

SELECT QuesScore FROM stuqueinfors WHERE PagerKey = ( SELECT knowledgeContentId FROM knowledges WHERE SubjectTree_Id = ( SELECT id FROM subjecttrees WHERE SubjectKey = #{subjectKey} AND TreeName = '来闯关' ) AND content = '仿真考核' ) AND StuKey =#{stuKey};
select Id,ClassName from classes WHERE Id='327d1845-8f5e-4da6-8e6e-c216ae24c175' OR Id='34bec0cf-73ca-4584-ad0e-ae72f259f02d';

select Id,ClassName from classes WHERE Id='1eccb9eb-8445-4875-9bb9-4cf56e258fbd' OR Id='6fde77c9-ace9-4346-ba73-4c5a17b12619' OR Id='69e42396-a1ec-4c68-85a3-6e4d043752af' OR Id='d476d93a-0735-4674-b7bd-b57f9f05d32d'OR Id='e71e6aa8-efbf-44c0-8632-c89ff3d1516c';
SELECT Id FROM `users` WHERE Id IN ( SELECT `User` FROM `classusers` WHERE Class = #{classId} );
select Id, Brithdate,Constellation,FamilyAddress,FamilyPhoneNum,MobilePhoneNum, MSN,Name,OfficePhoneNum,PassWord,QQNum,Sex,UserName,CreateDate,Email from users where Id=#{str} order BY UserName

SELECT Id FROM `users` WHERE Id IN ( SELECT `User` FROM `classusers` WHERE Class = '1eccb9eb-8445-4875-9bb9-4cf56e258fbd' OR Class = '6fde77c9-ace9-4346-ba73-4c5a17b12619' OR class ='69e42396-a1ec-4c68-85a3-6e4d043752af' OR class ='d476d93a-0735-4674-b7bd-b57f9f05d32d' OR class ='e71e6aa8-efbf-44c0-8632-c89ff3d1516c' );
SELECT Id FROM `users` WHERE Id IN ( SELECT `User` FROM `classusers` WHERE Class = '34bec0cf-73ca-4584-ad0e-ae72f259f02d' OR Class = '327d1845-8f5e-4da6-8e6e-c216ae24c175' );
